workWithUs.howWeWorkDescription: A personalized approach and precision — from the first measurement to the last screw.
workWithUs.step1Description: A specialist takes all measurements, considering niches, pipes, outlets, projections — so nothing interferes with the future kitchen. This is free of charge.
workWithUs.step2Description: We create a kitchen layout in the official program from the furniture manufacturer. The program considers everything: room dimensions, niches, layout features, and most importantly — the dimensions of household appliances from the built-in database. This eliminates errors and guarantees everything will fit perfectly.
workWithUs.step3Description: You receive a realistic project and the final estimate. No hidden additional charges — everything is transparent.
workWithUs.step4Description: In consultation with you, we will organize the assembly and coordinate your renovation without any time loss. Just as professionally, we will create a financing plan with you if desired.
workWithUs.step5Description: After approval, the order goes into production. Installation is carried out by certified installers — clean, neat, and according to standards.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: The protection of your personal data is very important to us. Below, we inform you about the collection, processing, and use of personal data on our website in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

responsible.title: 1. Data Controller
responsible.text: Data Controller in the sense of the GDPR:

accessData.title: 2. Access Data
accessData.text: When you visit our website, general information is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes, for example, the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your Internet service provider, etc. It is not possible to assign this data to a specific person.

contactForm.title: 3. Collection of Personal Data via the Contact Form
contactForm.text: If you contact us via the contact form, we will store your information (name, email address, phone number, message) to process your request. The processing is carried out on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR.

metaPixel.title: 4. Use of Meta Pixel (Facebook Pixel)
metaPixel.text1: We use the Meta Pixel from Meta Platforms Ireland Ltd. (4 Grand Canal Square, Dublin 2, Ireland) on our website. This allows us to track the behavior of visitors after they have been redirected to our website by clicking on a Facebook advertisement.
metaPixel.text2: This serves to optimize our Facebook advertisements and is based on your consent according to Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR. The data is usually transferred to Meta servers in the USA.
metaPixel.text3: You can revoke your consent at any time via the cookie banner.

cookies.title: 5. Use of Cookies
cookies.text1: This website uses cookies to provide certain functions and to analyze user behavior. When you first visit, you will be asked if you agree to the use of certain cookies. Your selection will be saved.
cookies.text2: You can change or revoke your consent at any time in the cookie banner.

legalBasis.title: 6. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.text: If we process your data based on your consent (e.g., for marketing cookies), this is done in accordance with Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR. If we process your data for the fulfillment of a contract or pre-contractual measures, Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR is the legal basis.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.text: You have the right to information, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection to the processing of your data. Please contact us using the contact details provided above.

dataRetention.title: 8. Duration of Storage
dataRetention.text: We store personal data only as long as necessary to process your request or to comply with legal retention obligations.

changes.title: 9. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.text: We reserve the right to adapt this Privacy Policy as needed, for example, in the event of legal changes or the expansion of our services.
